insertProduct.caption: StreetMap Premium North America
insertProduct.description: Provides high-quality street data for display, geocoding, and routing

insertProduct.caption: StreetMap Premium Europe
insertProduct.description: Provides high-quality street data for display, geocoding, and routing

insertProduct.caption: StreetMap Premium Latin America
insertProduct.description: Provides high-quality street data for display, geocoding, and routing

insertProduct.caption: StreetMap Premium Asia Pacific
insertProduct.description: Provides high-quality street data for display, geocoding, and routing

insertProduct.caption: StreetMap Premium Middle East and Africa
insertProduct.description: Provides high-quality street data for display, geocoding, and routing

insertProduct.caption: StreetMap Premium Japan
insertProduct.description: Provides high-quality street data for display, geocoding, and routing

insertProduct.caption: Publisher
insertProduct.description: Enables the sharing of content throughout the ArcGIS platform.

insertProduct.caption: Aviation Charting
insertProduct.description: Provides tools and workflows for working with aeronautical data and charting.

insertProduct.caption: Aviation Airports
insertProduct.description: Provides tools for airport planning, maintenance and analysis.

insertProduct.caption: Maritime Charting
insertProduct.description: Provides tools and workflows for working with nautical data and charting.

insertProduct.caption: Maritime Bathymetry
insertProduct.description: Provides tools and workflows for working with bathymetric data.

insertProduct.caption: Business Analyst
insertProduct.description: Provides advanced analysis tools and an extensive library of data from industry leading data providers to help you make better business decisions.

insertProduct.caption: Image Analyst
insertProduct.description: Delivers an integrated image interpretation and analysis workstation which provides powerful image visualization, exploitation, and feature extraction tools.

insertProduct.caption: LocateXT
insertProduct.description: Discover and extract geocoordinates, place names, and other critical information from unstructured text and place them instantly on a map.

dockPane.caption: Contents
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Open a map or layout view

button.caption: Refresh
button.extendedCaption: Refresh the selected container in the Project pane; on context menu
button.tooltip: Update the contents list to include any items that were recently added to this location.

button.caption: Catalog Pane
button.extendedCaption: Show the Catalog pane; on ribbon
button.tooltip:
Show the Catalog pane. You can access items in and available to the project, whether they are available on a local or network computer, or from a database, a server, ArcGIS Online, or your organization's portal.
With the Catalog pane you can drag and drop items onto a map, a model, or a tool parameter. Access geoprocessing and raster function history, and add your favorite items to the project.

button.caption: Catalog View
button.extendedCaption: Show the Catalog view; on ribbon
button.tooltip:
Open a view that provides access to items in and available to the project. All items and actions that are available in the Catalog pane are also available in the Catalog view. You can also access detailed information about available items.
With the Catalog view you can sort items, preview spatial data, edit an itemâ€™s metadata, manage styles and other items, and add your favorite items to the project.

button.caption: Columns
button.extendedCaption: Display Type Columns
button.tooltip: Display information for each item in columns.

button.caption: Tiles
button.extendedCaption: Display Type Tiles
button.tooltip: Display a thumbnail and other information on tiles.

button.caption: Options
button.extendedCaption: Show the Options dialog; on the Project tab
button.tooltip: Show the Options dialog box.

button.caption: Help
button.extendedCaption: Show the Help system; on the Project tab
button.tooltip: Get Help for the application.

button.caption: Exit
button.extendedCaption: Stop ArcGIS Pro; on the Project tab
button.tooltip: Close the ArcGIS Pro application.

button.caption: Paste
button.extendedCaption: Paste the item on the clipboard
button.tooltip: Paste from clipboard.

button.caption: Paste Special
button.extendedCaption: Paste the item on the clipboard using special settings
button.tooltip: Paste special from clipboard.

button.caption: Cut
button.extendedCaption: Cut the selected item and place the item on the clipboard
button.tooltip: Cut selection to the clipboard.

button.caption: Copy
button.extendedCaption: Copy the highlighted item(s) to the clipboard
button.tooltip: Copy selection to the clipboard.

button.caption: Copy Path
button.extendedCaption: Copy the path of the selected items to the Clipboard.
button.tooltip:
Copy the path of the selected items to the Clipboard.
Requires a selection in an active Catalog pane or view, or in the catalog view's Contents pane.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove the item from the project.
button.tooltip: Remove the selected items from the project. The references to the items are removed from the project. The selected items are not deleted.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete the selection; on map editing context menu
button.tooltip: Delete the selected items. For items that reference a file or folder on disk, the file or folder is deleted in the file system.

button.caption: Folder
button.extendedCaption: Add new folder
button.tooltip: Create a new folder.

button.caption: Repair
button.extendedCaption: Repair the broken project item
button.tooltip: Repair the broken project item. A project item can only be repaired when the project's reference to the item is broken, for example, when the file or folder associated with the project item cannot be located on the file system.

button.caption: Save
button.extendedCaption: Save changes to the current project; on Project tab
button.tooltip: Save the project.

button.caption: Save As
button.extendedCaption: Save the current project to a new file; on Project tab
button.tooltip: Save a copy of the ArcGIS Project file to a new location or with a new name.

button.caption: New
button.extendedCaption: Create a new project; on quick access toolbar
button.tooltip: Create a new project.

button.caption: Open
button.extendedCaption: Open an existing project; on quick access toolbar
button.tooltip: Open an existing project.

customControl.caption: Undo
customControl.extendedCaption: Show the history of previous operations that can be undone; on quick access toolbar

customControl.caption: Redo
customControl.extendedCaption: Show the history of previous operations that can be redone; on quick access toolbar

button.caption: Undo
button.extendedCaption: Undo the previous operation; on quick access toolbar
button.tooltip: Undo the previous operation.

button.caption: Redo
button.extendedCaption: Redo the previous operation; on quick access toolbar
button.tooltip: Redo the previous operation.

dynamicMenu.caption: Reset Panes
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Reset application panes to a predefined set; on View tab and quick access toolbar
dynamicMenu.tooltip: Reset application panes to a predefined set.

button.caption: Rename
button.extendedCaption: Rename the selected item; on context menu
button.tooltip: Rename the selected item. For project items that reference a file or folder on disk, the file or folder is renamed in the file system.

customControl.caption: Not Signed In
customControl.extendedCaption: Sign in or out of your organization; on ribbon
customControl.tooltip: Sign in or out of ArcGIS Online or your ArcGIS organization.

customControl.caption: test
customControl.tooltip: See messages regarding ArcGIS Pro, the project, or items in the project. Notifications are available when there is a blue dot.

button.caption: Contents
button.extendedCaption: Show the Contents pane; on ribbon
button.tooltip: Show the Contents pane.

button.caption: Unlink
button.tooltip: Unlink portal item

button.caption: Update
button.extendedCaption: Delete the copy of the item in the project and re-add the original portal item; on map context menu
button.tooltip:
Update this map or scene with changes made to the source web map or web scene on the active portal.
The copy of the portal item in the project is deleted, and the current version of the original portal item is added to the project. For example, update the copy of the web map in your project so you have the latest changes to its symbology.

button.caption: Default Sort
button.extendedCaption: Clear sorting
button.tooltip: Remove sorting that was applied to the contents list. Returns items in the list to their original order. Sorting can only be cleared from the contents list when using the columns display type.

button.caption: Details Panel
button.extendedCaption: Show the Details panel in the Catalog view, e.g. to see metadata or style items; on ribbon
button.tooltip: Show the Details panel in the Catalog view. This lets you preview an item's data, view its metadata, and manage style items within a style.

button.caption: Search My Organization
button.extendedCaption: When searching portal items in the Catalog view, only search items from your organization.
button.tooltip: When searching portal items in the Catalog view, only include items from your organization in the search results.

button.caption: Search All
button.extendedCaption: When searching portal items in the Catalog view, search entire portal.
button.tooltip: When searching portal items in the Catalog view, include all accessible items from the portal in the search results. This includes public items, items in groups that you can access, and items you own.

button.caption: Hide Pop-ups
button.extendedCaption: Show pop-ups in the catalog pane and view.
button.tooltip: Do not show information such as an item's location in a pop-up when you mouse over it in the Catalog pane and view.

button.caption: Show Pop-ups
button.extendedCaption: Show simple pop-ups in the catalog pane and view.
button.tooltip: Show information such as an item's location in a pop-up when you mouse over it in the Catalog pane and view.

button.caption: Show Detailed Pop-ups
button.extendedCaption: Show detailed pop-ups in the catalog pane.
button.tooltip: Show information such as an item's thumbnail and tags as well as its location in a pop-up when you mouse over the item in the Catalog pane. This option can help you find an item when you are not familiar with the contents of a portal, disk, database, or server. However, it can reduce overall performance when browsing enterprise geodatabases and ArcGIS Server services, and when accessing items with a slow internet or network connection.

button.caption: Zoom To Selection
button.extendedCaption: Zoom to selected features
button.tooltip: Zoom to the selected features of all layers.

button.caption: Zoom Full Extent
button.tooltip: Zoom to the full extent of the data in the view.

button.caption: Fixed Zoom In
button.extendedCaption: Fixed zoom in
button.tooltip: Zoom in a fixed distance.

button.caption: Fixed Zoom Out
button.extendedCaption: Fixed zoom out
button.tooltip: Zoom out a fixed distance.

button.caption: Previous Extent
button.extendedCaption: Previous extent
button.tooltip: Go to the previous extent.

button.caption: Next Extent
button.extendedCaption: Next extent
button.tooltip: Go to the next extent.

checkBox.caption: Show Basemap
checkBox.tooltip: Toggles visibility of the basemap in preview.

button.caption: Create Thumbnail
button.tooltip: Captures thumbnail from the preview area and updates metadata.

button.caption: Refresh
button.extendedCaption: Refresh the selected item.
button.tooltip: Update the contents list to include any items that were recently added to this location.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: Open the item in its view or pane, or browse into the item to see its contents.

button.caption: Add To Project
button.tooltip: Add an existing item to the project. The project saves a reference to the file or folder stored on the file system.

button.caption: Add To Favorites
button.extendedCaption: Add an item to project favorites; on context menu for folders, databases, and servers that have been added to the project
button.tooltip: Add the item to project favorites. Project favorites saves a reference to the existing item. If the item is not in a location that is accessible from other machines, it won't be available when using a different computer.

button.caption: Add To New Projects
button.extendedCaption: Add to new projects
button.tooltip: Add the item to project favorites and to all new projects. Project favorites saves a reference to the existing item. When a new project is create, a reference to the item is automatically added.

button.caption: Type
button.tooltip: Sort the contents list alphabetically by type. Items are initially sorted in ascending order. When sorted by type a second time, items are arranged in descending order.

button.caption: Date
button.tooltip: Sort the contents list by date. Items are initially sorted in from newest to oldest. When sorted by date a second time, items are arranged from oldest to newest.

button.caption: Name
button.tooltip: Sort the contents list alphabetically by name. Items are initially sorted in ascending order. When sorted by name a second time, items are arranged in descending order.

button.caption: Category
button.tooltip: Sort the contents list alphabetically by category. Items are initially sorted in ascending order. When sorted by category a second time, items are arranged in descending order.

button.caption: Key
button.tooltip: Sort the contents list using the internal key for style items. Items are initially sorted in ascending order. When sorted by key a second time, items are arranged in descending order.

dynamicMenu.caption: Sort
dynamicMenu.tooltip: Sort the contents list using item properties.

dynamicMenu.caption: Add
dynamicMenu.tooltip: Add an existing item to the project.

dynamicMenu.caption: Import
dynamicMenu.tooltip: Import an item into the project. The original item's content will be converted to the ArcGIS Pro format.

menu.caption: Folder General Item
menu.extendedCaption: Context menu for folders within a folder connection

insertTab.caption: New
insertTab.extendedCaption: New project page; on Project tab

insertTab.caption: Open
insertTab.extendedCaption: Open project page; on Project tab

insertTab.caption: Add-In Manager
insertTab.extendedCaption: Add-In Manager page; on Project tab
